name: smooth_barycentric_coord
initialProofState:
ι : Type u_1
𝕜 : Type u_2
E : Type u_3
inst✝⁴ : NontriviallyNormedField 𝕜
inst✝³ : CompleteSpace 𝕜
inst✝² : NormedAddCommGroup E
inst✝¹ : NormedSpace 𝕜 E
inst✝ : FiniteDimensional 𝕜 E
b : AffineBasis ι 𝕜 E
i : ι
⊢ ContDiff 𝕜 Top.top ⇑(b.coord i)
decl:
theorem smooth_barycentric_coord (b : AffineBasis ι 𝕜 E) (i : ι) : ContDiff 𝕜 ⊤ (b.coord i) :=
  (⟨b.coord i, continuous_barycentric_coord b i⟩ : E →ᴬ[𝕜] 𝕜).contDiff
